title: Is this a bug or what?
body: My friend gifted me a skin, Royal Guard Fiora. I loved it. After a week or so, I got into champ select..blah blah blah...I chose Fiora, but I couldn't choose the skin! It says it was unlocked. I don't understand..

replies.body: I pulled up your account and it looks like something happened with the person's account who sent the gift. I don't want to give out too much personal information over the boards, so go ahead and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to explain what went down there.
I'd say something simple like "Someone gifted me Royal Guard Fiora and now she's gone?" will work ^_^!
